long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple plugin to solve the issue of editing odoo website after adding a domain. 

How It Works:
- Automatic Copy: The extension automatically detects and saves your Odoo session ID when you visit the backend or website domain.
- One-Click Paste: Click the extension icon on the toolbar to paste the session ID into the current domain.
